mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.NAME, a.id AS articleId, a.title, a.create_time FROM sys_category c LEFT JOIN sys_article a ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.is_stick DESC, a.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.icon, -- CASE -- WHEN c.type = 0 THEN '#409EFF' -- WHEN c.type = 1 THEN '#67C23A' -- WHEN c.type = 2 THEN '#E6A23C' -- WHEN c.type = 3 THEN '#F56C6C' -- ELSE '#909399' -- END AS color, c.bg_color AS color, CONCAT('/', c.slug) AS path, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_article a WHERE a.category_id = c.id AND a.status = 1) AS articles, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM sys_article a WHERE a.category_id = c.id) AS users FROM sys_category c WHERE c.is_active = 1 AND c.type IN (0, 1, 2, 3) ORDER BY c.sort ASC LIMIT 6;
